info.name: Streaming Spectrogram
info.description:
Only the part of the spectrogram exposed with each new frame is rendered, giving a significant speedup.
This does not contain any improvements to the spectrogram itself over [url]https://www.shadertoy.com/view/MdjfzW[/url]

renderpass.code:
// Passthrough to Buf A

void mainImage( out vec4 f, in vec2 d ) { f = texelFetch(iChannel0, ivec2(d), 0); }
